metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1888 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient boundary checks when decoding JSON in handleBackslash readsout of bounds memory, potentially leading to DOS. This issue affects HHVM4.45.0, 4.44.0, 4.43.0, 4.42.0, 4.41.0, 4.40.0, 4.39.0, versions between4.33.0 and 4.38.0 (inclusive), versions between 4.9.0 and 4.32.0(inclusive), and versions prior to 4.8.7.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
